a little more about me

You can find links to my professional social media and resume on the my main page.

  • I write embedded code, mostly in C. I can also code in other languages.
  • I lived most of my life in Brazil.
  • I work for a start-up, Artiphon, that is changing the future of music creation. Touch sound
  • I haven’t always written code. I have worked in purchasing (Webb), oil equipment manufacturing (FMC Technologies), and even drilling on an drilling rig (Halliburton).
  • I love music and play guitar and sing in my free time.
